EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Forrester IMDG Wave_Q415.ConfirmationNew
EmailTemplate.subject: Forrester Wave – Would You Like to Know More?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Forrester Wave: In-Memory Data Grids, Q3 2015 report. We know you're likely considering all the options available for extracting value from all of your data and we appreciate the chance to show you our leading data solutions for Digital Transformation.
Check out these resources for more about Pivotal and the technologies that were discussed in the report:
- Pivotal GemFire <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-gemfire]]> - Case Study: Scaling Reservations for the World’s Largest Train System, China Railways Corporation <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/case-studies/china-railway-corp-for-chinese-new-year-chunyun]]> - Southwest Airlines and the Open Sourcing of Pivotal GemFire <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cCu0qAUT2Eo]]> - Apache Geode <[[http://geode.incubator.apache.org/]]> - Pivotal Big Data Suite <[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite]]>
Pivotal is leading a global technology movement to transform how the world builds software. Contact us <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your software-driven experiences.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
